title: Game 3 of the World Series Is Postponed Because of Rain
description: The Houston Astros and the Philadelphia Phillies are tied at one game apiece. The series is scheduled to resume Tuesday, and each remaining game will be pushed back one day.
dc:creator: David Waldstein
media:description: Fans tried to wait out the rain Monday at Citizens Bank Park in Philadelphia, but the postponement was announced shortly after 7 p.m. Eastern.
